021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
023import net.tnemc.core.manager.CurrencyManager;
024
025import java.math.BigDecimal;
026import java.util.HashMap;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.Optional;
029import java.util.TreeMap;
030import java.util.UUID;
031
032/**
033 * Represents a currency object.
034 *
035 * @author creatorfromhell
036 * @since 0.1.2.0
037 */
038public class Currency {
039
040  private final Map<String, Double> conversion = new HashMap<>();
041  private final TreeMap<BigDecimal, Denomination> denominations = new TreeMap<>();
042
043  //World-related configurations.
044  private final Map<String, CurrencyRegion> regions = new HashMap<>();
045
046  private String file;
047
048  //Balance-related configurations.
049  private BigDecimal startingHoldings;
050  private BigDecimal maxBalance;
051  private BigDecimal minBalance;
052
053  private boolean negativeSupport = false;
054  private boolean sync = true;
055
056  //identifier
057  private UUID uid;
058
059  //Icon used for menus.
060  private String iconMaterial;
061
062  //Utilized for backwards compat only
063  private String identifier;
064  private String type;
065
066  //Format-related configurations.
067  private String format;
068  private String symbol;
069  private String prefixes;
070  private String prefixesj;
071  private String decimal;
072  private boolean balanceShow;
073
074  private String display;
075  private String displayPlural;
076  private String displayMinor;
077  private String displayMinorPlural;
078  private boolean separateMajor;
079  private String majorSeparator;
080
081  //Weights and decimal places
082  private int decimalPlaces;
083  private int minorWeight;
084
085  //MISC configurations
086  private Note note;
087
088  public Currency(final String identifier) {
089
090    this.file = identifier + ".yml";
091
092    //Currency Info Configurations
093    this.uid = UUID.randomUUID();
094    this.identifier = identifier;
095    this.iconMaterial = "PAPER";
096    this.display = "Dollar";
097    this.displayPlural = "Dollars";
098    this.displayMinor = "Cent";
099    this.displayMinorPlural = "Cents";
100    this.symbol = "$";
101
102    //Currency Options Configurations
103    this.decimal = ".";
104    this.balanceShow = true;
105    this.decimalPlaces = 2;
106    this.type = "virtual";
107    this.minorWeight = 100;
108
109    //Formatting Configurations
110    this.format = "<symbol><major.amount><decimal><minor.amount>";
111    this.prefixes = "kMGTPEZYXWVUN₮";
112    this.prefixesj = "万億兆京垓\uD855\uDF71穣溝澗正載";
113    this.separateMajor = true;
114    this.majorSeparator = ",";
115
116    //Balance Configurations
117    this.startingHoldings = BigDecimal.ZERO;
118    this.maxBalance = CurrencyManager.largestSupported;
119    this.minBalance = BigDecimal.ZERO;
120
121    //World
122    this.regions.put("global", new CurrencyRegion("global", true, false));
123  }
124
125  public static Currency clone(final Currency original, final boolean item) {
126
127    final Currency cloned = (item)? new ItemCurrency(original.identifier) : new Currency(original.identifier);
128
129    cloned.file = original.file;
130    cloned.startingHoldings = original.startingHoldings;
131    cloned.maxBalance = original.maxBalance;
132    cloned.minBalance = original.minBalance;
133    cloned.negativeSupport = original.negativeSupport;
134    cloned.uid = original.uid;
135    cloned.iconMaterial = original.iconMaterial;
136    cloned.type = original.type;
137    cloned.format = original.format;
138    cloned.symbol = original.symbol;
139    cloned.prefixes = original.prefixes;
140    cloned.prefixesj = original.prefixesj;
141    cloned.decimal = original.decimal;
142    cloned.display = original.display;
143    cloned.displayPlural = original.displayPlural;
144    cloned.displayMinor = original.displayMinor;
145    cloned.displayMinorPlural = original.displayMinorPlural;
146    cloned.separateMajor = original.separateMajor;
147    cloned.majorSeparator = original.majorSeparator;
148    cloned.decimalPlaces = original.decimalPlaces;
149    cloned.minorWeight = original.minorWeight;
150    cloned.note = original.note;
151
152    if(cloned instanceof final ItemCurrency clonedItem && original instanceof final ItemCurrency itemCurrency) {
153      clonedItem.setEnderChest(itemCurrency.canEnderChest());
154      clonedItem.setEnderFill(itemCurrency.isEnderFill());
155    }
156
157    if(original instanceof ItemCurrency && !item || !(original instanceof ItemCurrency) && item) {
158
159      for(final Map.Entry<BigDecimal, Denomination> entry : original.getDenominations().entrySet()) {
160
161        cloned.denominations.put(entry.getKey(), Denomination.clone(entry.getValue(), item));
162      }
163    } else {
164      cloned.denominations.putAll(original.denominations);
165    }
166
167    cloned.conversion.putAll(original.conversion);
168    original.regions.forEach((key, value)->cloned.regions.put(key, new CurrencyRegion(value.region(), value.isEnabled(), value.isDefault())));
169
170    return cloned;
171  }
172
173  public Denomination getDenominationByWeight(final BigDecimal weight) {
174
175    return denominations.get(weight);
176  }
177
178  public boolean isNotable() {
179
180    return note != null;
181  }
182
183  public Optional<Note> getNote() {
184
185    return Optional.ofNullable(note);
186  }
187
188  public void setNote(final Note note) {
189
190    this.note = note;
191  }
192
193  public boolean isSync() {
194
195    return sync;
196  }
197
198  public void setSync(final boolean sync) {
199
200    this.sync = sync;
201  }
202
203  public CurrencyType type() {
204
205    final Optional<CurrencyType> type = TNECore.eco().currency().findType(this.type);
206    return type.orElseGet(()->TNECore.eco().currency().findType("virtual").get());
207  }
208
209  public Optional<BigDecimal> convertValue(final String currency, final BigDecimal amount) {
210
211    if(conversion.containsKey(currency)) {
212      return Optional.of(amount.multiply(BigDecimal.valueOf(conversion.get(currency))));
213    }
214    return Optional.empty();
215  }
216
217  public Map<String, Double> getConversion() {
218
219    return conversion;
220  }
221
222  public BigDecimal getStartingHoldings() {
223
224    return startingHoldings;
225  }
226
227  public void setStartingHoldings(final BigDecimal startingHoldings) {
228
229    this.startingHoldings = startingHoldings;
230  }
231
232  public BigDecimal getMaxBalance() {
233
234    return maxBalance;
235  }
236
237  public void setMaxBalance(final BigDecimal maxBalance) {
238
239    this.maxBalance = maxBalance;
240  }
241
242  public BigDecimal getMinBalance() {
243
244    return minBalance;
245  }
246
247  public void setMinBalance(final BigDecimal minBalance) {
248
249    this.minBalance = minBalance;
250  }
251
252  public String getFile() {
253
254    return file;
255  }
256
257  public void setFile(final String file) {
258
259    this.file = file;
260  }
261
262  public UUID getUid() {
263
264    return uid;
265  }
266
267  public void setUid(final UUID uid) {
268
269    this.uid = uid;
270  }
271
272  public String getIdentifier() {
273
274    return identifier;
275  }
276
277  public void setIdentifier(final String identifier) {
278
279    this.identifier = identifier;
280    this.file = identifier + ".yml";
281  }
282
283  public String getIconMaterial() {
284
285    return iconMaterial;
286  }
287
288  public void setIconMaterial(final String iconMaterial) {
289
290    this.iconMaterial = iconMaterial;
291  }
292
293  public String getType() {
294
295    return type;
296  }
297
298  public void setType(final String type) {
299
300    this.type = type;
301  }
302
303  public String getFormat() {
304
305    return format;
306  }
307
308  public void setFormat(final String format) {
309
310    this.format = format;
311  }
312
313  public String getSymbol() {
314
315    return symbol;
316  }
317
318  public void setSymbol(final String symbol) {
319
320    this.symbol = symbol;
321  }
322
323  public String getPrefixes() {
324
325    return prefixes;
326  }
327
328  public void setPrefixes(final String prefixes) {
329
330    this.prefixes = prefixes;
331  }
332
333  public String getPrefixesj() {
334
335    return prefixesj;
336  }
337
338  public void setPrefixesj(final String prefixesj) {
339
340    this.prefixesj = prefixesj;
341  }
342
343  public String getDecimal() {
344
345    return decimal;
346  }
347
348  public void setDecimal(final String decimal) {
349
350    this.decimal = decimal;
351  }
352
353  public boolean isBalanceShow() {
354
355    return balanceShow;
356  }
357
358  public void setBalanceShow(final boolean balanceShow) {
359
360    this.balanceShow = balanceShow;
361  }
362
363  public String getDisplay() {
364
365    return display;
366  }
367
368  public void setDisplay(final String display) {
369
370    this.display = display;
371  }
372
373  public String getDisplayPlural() {
374
375    return displayPlural;
376  }
377
378  public void setDisplayPlural(final String displayPlural) {
379
380    this.displayPlural = displayPlural;
381  }
382
383  public String getDisplayMinor() {
384
385    return displayMinor;
386  }
387
388  public void setDisplayMinor(final String displayMinor) {
389
390    this.displayMinor = displayMinor;
391  }
392
393  public String getDisplayMinorPlural() {
394
395    return displayMinorPlural;
396  }
397
398  public void setDisplayMinorPlural(final String displayMinorPlural) {
399
400    this.displayMinorPlural = displayMinorPlural;
401  }
402
403  public boolean isSeparateMajor() {
404
405    return separateMajor;
406  }
407
408  public void setSeparateMajor(final boolean separateMajor) {
409
410    this.separateMajor = separateMajor;
411  }
412
413  public String getMajorSeparator() {
414
415    return majorSeparator;
416  }
417
418  public void setMajorSeparator(final String majorSeparator) {
419
420    this.majorSeparator = majorSeparator;
421  }
422
423  public int getDecimalPlaces() {
424
425    return decimalPlaces;
426  }
427
428  public void setDecimalPlaces(final int decimalPlaces) {
429
430    this.decimalPlaces = decimalPlaces;
431  }
432
433  public int getMinorWeight() {
434
435    return minorWeight;
436  }
437
438  public void setMinorWeight(final int minorWeight) {
439
440    this.minorWeight = minorWeight;
441  }
442
443  public boolean negativeSupport() {
444
445    return negativeSupport;
446  }
447
448  public TreeMap<BigDecimal, Denomination> getDenominations() {
449
450    return denominations;
451  }
452
453  public boolean isGlobal() {
454
455    return (regions.containsKey("global") && regions.get("global").isEnabled());
456  }
457
458  public boolean isGlobalDefault() {
459
460    if(isGlobal()) {
461      return regions.get("global").isDefault();
462    }
463    return false;
464  }
465
466  public boolean regionEnabled(final String region) {
467
468    return isGlobal() || (regions.containsKey(region) && regions.get(region).isEnabled());
469  }
470
471  public boolean isRegionDefault(final String region) {
472
473    if(regions.containsKey(region)) {
474      return regions.get(region).isDefault();
475    }
476    return false;
477  }
478
479  public Map<String, CurrencyRegion> getRegions() {
480
481    return regions;
482  }
483}
